Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Created by Hein Ferman
27.01.2014 JH SCR18661 Added v.Includehistory to make a conditional range on BNKA_ACCOUNTCLOSED
19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
31.08.2011 JH SCR16709 Change allignment of the Balance column to right
03.07.2009 SH SCR14463 Replaced old message box program with GB007 (PH0297)
22.03.2007 SH SCR12270 Changed OPH106A.PI.BANK_ID to be updated
with PI.BANK_ID in case of button New (not v.BNKA_BANK_ID as before)
08.11.2006 AK SCR12079 set 'Close task window' to YES in the online task
23.06.2006 JJ SCR11490 Added call print program
02.12.2005 WJ SCR9664 change display condition
14.07.2005 MACIEK PL menu Excel enabled - allowed by JDOs mail 10.07.2005
09.06.2005 SH SCR8455 Uses now user event "b.AccountTotals" to call
OPH106F via button Accunt totals, before UserAction 8 was in use
21.03.2005 SH SCR7973 Added proper button handling for button "Account totals"
16.03.2005 MACIEK_PL SCR 7973 Button for report OPH106F was added
29.10.2004 SH SCR7259 Added module to delete related rows in other files, BADT,
BADP, BDPL, ..., if an bankaccount has to be deleted.
11.08.2003 EE SCR4070 add fields and allow range locate
31.07.2003 SH SCR3879 Changed only CenterScreenInOnline to 'Y' if default = 'N'
20.05.2003 SH SCR3577 Set "CenterScreenInOnline = Y" to ini if screen started
- and locate cursor only on current row if the cloacte virtuals > 0
29.04.2003 SH SCR3285 Removed range on BNKA_BANKID with PI.BANK_BANKID
27.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
20.09.2002 JJ added 8th argument 'M' to call OPH106A for new
18.09.2002 SCR2151 Add new button "Daily totals" to call OPH106B
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Select new field "BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER" it's now
- a segment of primary key
-- SCR#762 06.02.2002 SH (Buttons replaced as in OMN programs)
-- SCR#778 06.02.2002 SH (Move check if delete is allowed in the
ControlTask, enhanced performance in online task)
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Client details --> EXIT
-- Client details --> modify
-- Client details --> query
-- Client details --> create
-- Call OPH106B Daily totals
-- Delete bank account
... Ask acknowledgement if can be deleted if no BADT rows exists
... Ask special acknowledgement if can be deleted if BADT rows exists
... delete bankaccount, if 2. message = 'Yes' also related rows in BADT, BADP,..
-- Info: 'Please close previous Excel file'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(SUM (BNKA_NEWBALANCE) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BNKA where BNKA_BANK_ADMNO= :2 and BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO= :3 and bnka_codetypeaccount <> 6 for read only

Text.val: -- Button Modify --> GOTO OPH106A Client Details, only READ
-- Button Modify --> GOTO OPH106A Client Details
-- Button Modify --> GOTO OPH106B Daily totals
-- Button Exit
-- Button New --> GOTO OPH106A Client Details
-- Button Delete
-- Delete also related bookings (see 2. acknowledegment "Control task")
